meanings.definition: A large hare of western North America with long ears and long hind legs.
meanings.sent1: The jackrabbits hopped gracefully across the field.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of jackrabbits running through the desert.
meanings.sent3: The jackrabbits decided to have a hopping race for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were like jackrabbits, always leaping ahead of everyone else's.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the size of the jackrabbits' ears.

meanings.sent1: The car jackrabbits down the road when the light turns green.
meanings.sent2: She jackrabbits out of bed when she heard the alarm clock.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel jackrabbits up the tree to escape the chasing cat.
meanings.sent4: Time jackrabbits forward when you're having fun.
meanings.sent5: The ball jackrabbits across the field after being kicked.
